body: I think blogging is fun too and am excited to share thoughts with others while discussing new things here!
Both animation and development have heavy specialization by teams. Managing those teams to produce something together is probably the greatest challenge.
I love the beach!! I wish I could go more often, but I'm not sure it would be the same if I was working the whole time.
Agreed that working changes things. Although, just imagine being able to soak up some sun instead of staying in the fortress of solitude all day...
